entityviewdistance.menu.title: Entity Distance Settings
entityviewdistance.menu.option.vanilla_d:
Changes vanilla entity distance modifier.
It's used for entities with default value
entityviewdistance.menu.separator.entity:
Values are stored as distance in blocks.
Value of -1 changes it to default.
entityviewdistance.side.both.desc: Custom view distances are applied on client and (lan) server
entityviewdistance.side.client.desc: Custom view distances are applied only on client
entityviewdistance.side.server.desc: Custom view distances are applied only on (singleplayer/lan) server and ignored on multiplayer servers
